name: authentically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that accurately represents how something really is: The food is authentically Mexican. He authentically recreates a classic soul sound.
in a way that is honest or sincere: We want to live more authentically. He has authentically been listening to the people. See
authentic
More examplesFewer examplesMany locals believe that the movie authentically portrays the region's character. The restoration of the building has been done very authentically.We wanted to create models that would authentically replicate famous aeroplanes.The show depicts the human condition more authentically and sympathetically than most.We wanted to find fiction that was written authentically in a female voice.This is authentically a role reversal.
